member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting.DisableRateLimitingAttribute
member.summary: Metadata that disables request rate limiting on an endpoint.
member.remarks: Completely disables the rate limiting middleware from applying to this endpoint.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting.EnableRateLimitingAttribute
member.summary: Metadata that provides endpoint-specific request rate limiting.
member.remarks: Replaces any policies currently applied to the endpoint. The global limiter will still run on endpoints with this attribute applied.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of using the specified policy.
member.param: The name of the policy which needs to be applied.

member.summary: The name of the policy which needs to be applied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting.EnableRateLimitingAttribute.Policy
member.summary: The policy which needs to be applied, if present.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting.RateLimiterOptions.GlobalLimiter
member.summary: Gets or sets the global that will be applied on all requests. The global limiter will be executed first, followed by the endpoint-specific limiter, if one exists.

member.summary: Gets or sets a that handles requests rejected by this middleware.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting.RateLimiterOptions.RejectionStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the default status code to set on the response when a request is rejected. Defaults to .
member.remarks: This status code will be set before is called, so any status code set by will "win" over this default.
